title: (WiP) [PBE 17/02] Nerfs to Jarvan, Katarina and Kassadin, Buffs to Janna, New Items – Luden’s Echo,

embed.description: Work-in-progress! PBE 17/02 [ Reminder ] The PBE is a testing ground for changes. What you see here may not reflect what you see in Patch Notes.

body:
**PBE 17/02

Champion Changes**

[ **Reminder **] The PBE is a testing ground for changes. What you see here may not reflect what you see in Patch Notes. Remember that developers want your feedback so if you disagree with a change, you can always submit your thoughts on the PBE Community Forums.

**All PBE Updates for Patch 5.4 Cycle**:

    **[10/02]** [Zilean Rework & New Spell Icons, Sona Stat Nerfs ](http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/wip-pbe-big-changes-to-zilean-33680/)
    **[12/02]** [New Splash Arts for Katarina & DJ Sona](http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/wip-pbe-1202-new-splash-arts-for-katarina-dj-sona-33769/)
   ** [13/02]** [Changes to Veigar and Mordekaiser, Trist Splash](http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/wip-pbe-1302-new-tristana-splash-art-changes-to-veigar-33826/)

**Champion Changes**

Janna {{champion:40}} 

**Tailwind [ Passive ]**
Movement speed buff to nearby allies **increased** from 5% to 8%

**Zepyhr [ W ]**
Passive movement speed buff **increased** from 4/6/8/10/12% to 9/11/13/15/17%

Jarvan IV {{champion:59}} 

Base armor **increased** from 24 to 27

**Demacian Standard [ E ]**
**No longer **grants Armor

Kassadin {{champion:38}} 

**Riftwalk [ R ]**
Initial mana cost **decreased **from 75 at all ranks to 60
Range **decreased** from 700 to 450

Katarina {{champion:55}} 

**Voracity [ Passive ]**
Now reduces Katarina’s cooldowns **only if** a champion she has damaged in the last 3 seconds dies

**Item Changes**

New items – **Luden’s Echo**, **Mandrake Ward** and a **Mana Gem** – will have descriptions and tooltips when the PBE’s back up.

If you have any questions, feel free to ask me at @NoL_Chefo or e-mail me at nolchefo@gmail.com.

replies.body:
Tough time with J4. His early jungle struggles. 
I have to head back nearly dying getting my red after Frog -> Blue -> Wolves.
How is this a nerf? Rito said they were going to nerf her, and this is it? Katerina is still broken... and Rito seem to have no idea why...
I personally don't think the Katarina change is going to do much.

thats actually massive to reset kat...

since the window for assists and even kills from other sources is much longer than 3 seconds....but overall, not much...just stops her failing an engage and running out waiting for an assist to kick in...

I guess it will effect Katarina in regards to prolonged team fights. The change has really made her into a proper assassin aimed at 100-0 a target in an instant. I say she'd do well in the mid game with this change. Where Katarina has built substantial ability power and the enemy has minimal magic resist.

its a straight nerf.....to teamfight resets.

she will do exactly the same in 1 vs 1 and most 1 vs 2s. but as soon as she has to wait for positioning and if she messes up in the slightest and has to escape, or hell, if someone uses zonyas and then someone ELSE gets the killing blow, thats her 3 second window blown.
I do believe the mana gem got removed as what Moobeat said at Surrender at 20.

Rito said Kat was getting buffed due to DFG being gone...

Where is the buff? 

Don't tell me that piss weak AA buff was it?
